ing: 4 slices precooked bacon, microwaved according to package directions
1/2 avocado - peeled, pitted, and thinly sliced
des: "A light and healthy sandwich on those days when you want something yummy, yet not really heavy.  Perfect in the summertime with fresh garden-ripe tomatoes!"
ins: Spread mayonnaise on one side of both slices of toasted bread. Top a bread slice with provolone cheese, turkey, bacon, avocado, tomato, and lettuce. Place the remaining bread slice on top, slice in half, and serve.
